entry.title: Hallo! System is now being translated to german!
entry.content:
Caroline Jansen, an exchange student in Brazil and also a very kind person, is going to translate the intervention to German. She has lived in Brazil for about 9 months studying at Federal University of Juiz de Fora and working at General Consulate of Germany (deutschen Auslandsvertretungen) in Rio de Janeiro.

The german version is expected to come out at the end of 2014.

If you like to join her spreading the word, reach us.

Hallo! System is now being translated to german! was originally published by Henrique Pinto Gomide at Live without tobacco project. on May 26, 2013.

entry.title: System is ready to translation
entry.content:
After 2 months working on code, the system is ready to translation. If you like to contribute and help spread the support of smoking cessation support, you just need to reach the spreadsheet in Google Docs.

At this moment, we just support Brazilian portuguese. The English and Spanish versions are expected to be released on August.

Happy translation :)

System is ready to translation was originally published by Henrique Pinto Gomide at Live without tobacco project. on May 18, 2013.

entry.title: Live without tobacco - first realease
entry.content:
“Live without tobacco” - the first open source web-assisted tobacco intervention is released. After 1 year of development, the portuguese version of the intervention is finally released. Now, we are seeking parterns for testing and translating in other languages.

The code is available in our github repository.

In the next weeks, we are going to upload the documentation for install the intervention in your computer.

Live without tobacco - first realease was originally published by Henrique Pinto Gomide at Live without tobacco project. on May 01, 2013.
